def sort_array(array):

    * sort_array([2, 4, 3, 0, 1, 5, 6]) => [6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 0]
    """
    # create the array of length the same as the original array
    array_copy = array[:]

    # loop through the original array
    while len(array_copy) < len(array):
        # get the next index from the original array
        index = array_copy.index(array_copy.pop(0))

        # compare it with the current index of the array
        if array[index] > array[index - 1]:
            # increment the index of the last element
            array_copy.append(array_copy.pop(0))
        elif array[index] < array[index + 1]:
            # decrement the index of the first element
            array_copy.insert(0, array_copy.pop(0))

        # increment the index of the next element
        array_copy.append(array_copy.pop(0))

        # decrement the index of the previous element
        array_copy.insert(0, array_copy.pop(0))

    # return the sorted array
    return array_copy
